Oracle.ManagedDataAccess.Core NuGet Package 2.19.120 README
===========================================================
Release Notes: Oracle Data Provider for .NET Core

July 2021

This document provides information that supplements the Oracle Data Provider for .NET (ODP.NET) documentation.

You have downloaded Oracle Data Provider for .NET. The license agreement is available here:
https://www.oracle.com/downloads/licenses/distribution-license.html


New Features
============
None


Bug Fixes since Oracle.ManagedDataAccess.Core NuGet Package 2.19.110
====================================================================
Bug 32219937 - ORACLEDATAADAPTER FAILS WITH AUTOMATIC GENERATION OF SELECTCOMMAND
Bug 32325273 - INVALIDCASTEXCEPTION WHEN USING SUPPRESSGETDECIMALINVALIDCASTEXCEPTION WITH A VALUE THAT IS VERY SMALL
Bug 32414293 - DRCP CONNECTION THROWS ERROR ORA-03106: FATAL TWO-TASK COMMUNICATION 
Bug 32611601 - MANAGED ODP.NET DATAADAPTER.FILL THROWS NULLREFERENCEEXCEPTION WHEN QUERY CONTAINS BLOB COLUMN
Bug 32739751 - SEPS NET SERVICE NAMES ARE CASE SENSITIVE BUT SHOULD BE CASE INSENSITIVE
Bug 32749274 - ORA-12268 OR ORA-12269 IS ENCOUNTERED WHEN USING NATIVE ENCRYPTION (NAE)
Bug 32874893 - SHOULD THROW ERRORS FOR INVALID CONFIGURATION IN ENCRYPTION AND CHECKSUM ALGORITHM LIST
Bug 32940898 - ODPC: .NET CORE APPLICATION FAILS WITH SYSTEM.EXCEPTION: TTC ERROR
Bug 32966701 - CONNECTION POOL REACHING MAX POOL SIZE CONNECTING TO RAC DB WHILE USING FSF FAILOVER ON DATAGUARD
Bug 33074743 - CONNECTION FAILS WITH "ORA-12649: NATIVE SERVICES: UNKNOWN ENCRPYTION OR DATA INTEGRITY ALGORITHM" IF SET TO BEQ IN SQLNET.AUTHENTICATION_SERVICES

 Copyright (c) 2021, Oracle and/or its affiliates.
